subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: This season’s 49ers seem to be an echo of their glory years, when the owner Eddie DeBartolo empowered an inner circle of Bill Walsh and John McVay to act on its own.
snippet: This season’s 49ers seem to be an echo of their glory years, when the owner Eddie DeBartolo empowered an inner circle of Bill Walsh and John McVay to act on its own.
